alert.note: Alert for Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 6:44PM CST until December 09 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN WEBSTER COUNTY... At 644 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Montpelier, or 8 miles south of Houston, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Webster County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for north central and northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
